trans-unit.source: This dataset contains a series of records from steel annealing trials with the physical attributes (width, thickness, type (coil, sheet, etc.) of the resulting steel types.<html></html> <html></html><html></html>Usage:<html></html> Predict any of two numeric class attributes; hardness or strength. You might also analyze correlations among attributes.<html></html> <html></html>Steel grades follow a set standard, defined by SAE and other organizations. You are looking for a specific 'grade' (the class variable) and want to understand the values needed. <html></html> <html></html><html></html>Related Research:<html></html> Sterling, D. & Buntine, W., (NA). UCI Machine Learning Repository <html></html>http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml<html></html>. Irvine, CA: University of California, School of Information and Computer Science <html></html> <html></html>A useful guide to steel grades can be found here: <html></html>http://www.outokumpu.com/SiteCollectionDocuments/Outokumpu-steel-grades-properties-global-standards.pdf<html></html>
